justification: "In the first months of Grades 1 and 3, students' mathematics ... achievement scores were collected with standardized achievement tests."
The article notes that in Grade 3 "the students took the mathematics tests in German ... students answered items from three mathematics competence domains" as part of the standardized test.

measured_by: standardized language test of listening & early literacy (Grade 1)
justification: "For language achievement, students completed a test in Grade 1 in Luxembourgish … The standardized language tests consisted of 'listening comprehension' and 'early literacy comprehension.'"

measured_by: standardized language test of listening & reading comprehension (Grade 3)
justification: "In Grade 3, the students took the listening and reading comprehension language achievement tests in German… we calculated a mean score across listening and reading comprehension."

measured_by: International Socio-Economic Index (ISEI) from parent occupation list
justification: "Parents identified their occupation… To approximate the parents' SES, an average value of all occupational categories was computed on the basis of the validated ISEI scale."

measured_by: parent-reported birthplace categories (native / first / second generation)
justification: "To indicate a child's migration status, parents further specified where they and their child were born. This was translated into three categories of migration status."

measured_by: student questionnaire on languages used with parents
justification: "The first graders also answered a questionnaire on the language(s) they spoke with their parents… we coded the language(s) spoken at home".
